{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = GL.iNet GL-E750.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Portable Wi-Fi Travel Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.gl-inet.com/products/gl-e750/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |fandom = <!-- infodepot.fandom page, included underscores --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = GL.iNet |model = GL-E750 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 2020/08/11 |page_start_origon = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/gl.inet/gl.inet_gl-e750 |wlclass = AC750 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = travel router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = 2AFIW-E750C4 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9531; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = <!-- ARM,MIPS,x86-64, --> |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 650 <!-- doc? --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = SPI NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = GigaDevice;GD5F1GQ4UFYIG; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = SPI NOR |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Winbond;W25Q128FVSG; |flash2size = 16 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR2 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = Nano SIM, MicroSD, USB 2.0, Mini PCIe |exp_sim_num = 1 |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = BAT |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_bat = |pwr_bat_amp = |pwr_bat_type = |pwr_bat_mAh = 7000 |pwr_bat_cells = |pwr_conn = USB |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = LTE |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = <!-- Yes, or No, --> |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9887; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 1 |rad2rxchains = 1 |rad2sstreams = 1 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam2 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad2ac = 433 |rad2n = 150 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}}
